kr.dogfoot.hwplib.org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem

Class POIFSDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.dogfoot.hwplib.org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.POIFSDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    POIFSViewable, BATManaged, BlockWritable

    public final class POIFSDocument
extends Object
implements BATManaged, BlockWritable, POIFSViewable
    This class manages a document in the POIFS filesystem.
    Author:
    Marc Johnson (mjohnson at apache dot org)

      • preferArray

        public boolean preferArray()
        Give viewers a hint as to whether to call getViewableArray or getViewableIterator
        Specified by:
        preferArray in interface POIFSViewable
        Returns:
        true if a viewer should call getViewableArray, false if a viewer should call getViewableIterator
